title: Replace A1534 keyboard
message: Somebody replaced this keyboard on A1534 model? Is is like A1466 or A1502 or harder?

title: Replace A1534 keyboard
message:
Expensive and sucks. tiny shitty screws everywhere. Some good skills required not to fuck up this newer stuff, lots of fragile connectors/cables/screws, you have been warned!
Also forget about popping off the keys if you want to swap to another layout, you will fuck up the butterfly mechanisms unless you have done this 10 times before.

title: Replace A1534 keyboard
message: Are they still riveted in or only tiny ass screws now?

title: Replace A1534 keyboard
message: Screws and glue this time around.
